pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Sweatpy[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/sweat)](https://pepy.tech/project/sweat)> :warning: **Sweatpy is currently undergoing major revisions which will result in deprecations and backwards incompatible changes. We recommend pinning your sweatpy dependency in your requirements.txt file (e.g. `sweat==0.19.0`).**Documentation can be found [here](https://sweatpy.gssns.io).## Contributors[Maksym Sladkov](https://github.com/sladkovm)[Aart Goossens](https://github.com/AartGoossens)## LicenseSee [LICENSE](LICENSE) file.
